name: Fright Night (itch) (gtibo, Paul Bellon-Serre)
description:
What were you thinking when you found this old dusty book titled "Necronomicon"? 

Out of curiosity, you summoned a ghost from the depths of hell! Fortunately, this ghost seems pretty clumsy but he's making a mess inside your apartment.

You have 2 minutes to stop him before he posesses all the objects in your apartment and takes your soul! 👻

Controls
  • W/A/S/D to move around
  • Move the mouse to look around
  • Left mouse button to interact
